Articles.Content:
O|{. Good JO|{E. We get it.

I assume that they are done with .23.5 as they have time for april fools.

Edited April 1, 2014 by Sandworm

Or Fs, or *s, it's weird.

Edit: Appears to be forum wide.

No issues this end.

Is anyone else having all of their "*s" replaced with asteris*s? Or is there a problem with my mobile browser?

EDIT: this is the first scratchpad upload that has a file size as near as I can tell. I don't *now if that actually changes anything or if more display options of the history trac*ers have been enabled.

Or Fs, or *s, it's weird.

Edit: Appears to be forum wide.

It's happening!! This is how they announce it!!

Hmm... O*ay test 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 0 *erbal Space Program The quic* brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

Edit: yep, there as you can see, the letter "*" is being replaced by * for some reason.
I get it. Haha, SQUAD forum admins. Haha.
I would also note today's date before prematurely reaching that conclusion... =P

It's happening!! This is how they announce it!!

NOPE. Its 1st April..

No patch today.

No issues this end.

Edit: Looks like it breaks links, too, had to manually fix.
Well, they seem to have blocked the letter K. Look at the rules, 2.2i.

Is anyone else having all of their "*s" replaced with asteris*s? Or is there a problem with my mobile browser?

EDIT: this is the first scratchpad upload that has a file size as near as I can tell. I don't *now if that actually changes anything or if more display options of the history trac*ers have been enabled.

NOPE. Its 1st April..

No patch today.

Well. It was tongue-in-cheek. So. You know. But, that being said, I'm still 100% sure that this is how they would announce the release: by replacing all of the Ks with *s.
And they just turned it off. Kerbals kan keep their Ks

Well, they seem to have blocked the letter K. Look at the rules, 2.2i.

Just checked. Don't see a 2.2.i. Ends at 2.2.h.

EDIT: It was just a diversion. Quick, everyone check to see if ARM has been released!

Just checked. Don't see a 2.2.i. Ends at 2.2.h.

They removed it, it used to say "the letter k"

Well, they seem to have blocked the letter K. Look at the rules, 2.2i.

April fools day.

April fools day.

I know, but it's gone again.
Damn, I missed it. The obliteration of the letter K is a move I can get behind.
Shall we get back on topic?

Damn, I missed it. The obliteration of the letter K is a move I can get behind.

Are you sure NovaSiliso?
If its releasing today. Ill let steam download it! And no, Im not afraid, I will do this!
does anybody know what the big bug that is causing the delay is, I asked during lolbster's stream and he didn't know :|

does anybody know what the big bug that is causing the delay is, I asked during lolbster's stream and he didn't know :|

Eh? a big bug?

I'm suspicious now.

The scratchpad upload happened almost immediately after I posted that Steam had gone 20 hours without an update. That was also about the same time all of the "K"s changed.

EDIT: And Lincoln's secretary's name was Kennedy. And jet fuel doesn't burn hot enough to liquidize steel. And you never see Batman in the same room as Iron Man.

Edited April 1, 2014 by FlexGunship

does anybody know what the big bug that is causing the delay is, I asked during lolbster's stream and he didn't know :|

Unfortunately no. Hopefully it won't hold them back too much!
True, it's getting suspicious!

does anybody know what the big bug that is causing the delay is, I asked during lolbster's stream and he didn't know :|
Putting "K"s in the name of your ship caused kraken attacks. As you can see, we've been working on the problem this morning.
